programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: Sloppy and Imp both want the latest limited-edition Falcon Fly sneakers. Seeing this, Poly-GON manipulates them into competing with each other for the shoes. They get so distracted hunting for the sneakers that they neglect their Squad rescue mission. Finding the shoes at an auction, Sloppy and the Imp realise the bid is a price with much higher than money.

programme.title: Creative Galaxy
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Arty and his sidekick Epiphany, as they search the galaxy to solve creative problems with art!

programme.title: Little Tami's Book
programme.desc: The trio makes a mess after fooling around in the shopping mall's toilet. Tami's Mother sends them into Booky to learn more about the Janitor occupation. Will cleaning be as easy as they think? Will they finally learn to acknowledge and appreciate the janitor's role?

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in "Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck". And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Piper loves to play! But when the Trainees are given a job to do, playtime is cut short. Can Wilson, Koko and Brewster get Piper to put a pause on playtime in order to make their delivery to Safari Park?

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: Captain Redbeard is going to a party and he wants to be the most fancy pirate there. Paula and her friends have to find things that come in pairs for Redbeard's make-over. Aamil is tasked with looking after Mr Merchant camel, but he gets distracted and the camel goes missing. Aamil gets help from Paula and her friends to find the missing camel. Will they succeed?

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: Animated series about a fairy and her adventures running a neighborhood cafe with her friends.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Four young birds - Penny, Rod, Swift, and Brody - become new Top Wing cadets to earn their wings by helping their community.

programme.title: The Enchanted Village Of Pinocchio
programme.desc: THE ENCHANTED VILLAGE OF PINOCCHIO is a fun and positive adaptation of Carlo Collodi's masterpiece. It's a series for the entire family, both moving and funny, where the world of childhood meets the world of fairy tales.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a return match. He decides to build his own racing machine to challenge the Lemmings' soapbox.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by a few uncatchable flies which buzz incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.desc: Come along with Xavier Riddle, the most effusive pint-sized history adventurer; Yadina, his effervescent little sister; and his brilliant best friend Brad, as they unravel the secrets of world famous heroes from history!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Special - The Island
programme.desc: An expedition led by Misako, Master Wu and Clutch Powers goes missing while exploring an uncharted island and the ninja must pick up their trail...

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: In wrestling class Coach teaches the class about being a Face or a Heel. They must all decide what they will be. At school, Iz tries out being bad while Bob is desperate to be good. It all goes horribly wrong and they end up in the principal's office!

programme.title: 31st SEA Games: Daily Action At The Games
programme.desc: (Live) Catch our Team Singapore athletes in action each day as they show their spirit and character at the 31st SEA Games in Vietnam.

programme.title: 31st SEA Games: Today At The Games
programme.desc: Hosted by Edward Russell and Kelly Latimer, "Today at the Games" features a daily round-up of Team Singapore's performance at the Games.

programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

programme.title: Survivor 42
programme.desc: (Encore) Jeff Probst returns to Fiji to host the latest season of Survivor with an all-new group of contestants.

programme.title: Emerald Islands Of Malaysia
programme.desc: The islands of Malaysia are jewels of the natural world, ecological paradises where ancient rainforests cascade down mountains into crystal clear seas. Each is a haven for wildlife, each boasts its own wildlife story. The episode features a number of enigmatic species both above and below the water. From silvered langurs caring for their bright orange babies and ants tending their herds of mealy bugs to boisterous mudskippers and a noisy fruit bat roost.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal USA
programme.desc: One of America's most popular and beloved game shows, "Deal or No Deal", is back with it iconic host Howie Mandel.

programme.title: Hoppy & Friends
programme.desc: Hoppy and Friends is a Pre-school series featuring Hoppy, the Rabbit, Leo the Lion and Panny the Panda. Every episode, they embark on an adventure through stories. Join them on a fantastic journey and explore the wonderful world around them through song, dance.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze
programme.desc: Never having taken the bus before, Hiccup and Sneeze are a bit hesitant to catch a bus to the shops on their own. Bibi suggests a pretend bus trip to ease their worries.

programme.title: Tumble Leaf
programme.desc: Tumble Leaf is set in a whimsical land where a small blue fox named Fig plays each day and discovers adventure, friendship and love around every bend in the path.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: In this brand new version of the beloved series, Thomas travels full steam ahead across five continents, discovering magnificent new sights and experiencing exciting places and cultures.

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train
programme.desc: The sky looks darker than usual today, and the little trains are worried. Fix and Lift warn the little trains that there may be a storm coming, but Diesel ignores their warning and goes out. After Diesel leaves, the weather gets worse. Thunder roars and lightning flashes. Titipo and Genie become worried about Diesel and go out to find him.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero travel to Peru to take a marvellous spatuletail home. But what can they do when the hungry bird falls into a deep sleep? A trip to the rainforest becomes necessary when a clouded leopard cub turns up in the garden. The Junior Rangers search for the cub's mother, but are set back when the cub gets entangled in some tree vines above water.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends.The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko as the heroic trio goes into the night to save the day!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Chloe and her family come together to help an injured Pokemon, but its recovery has unexpected side effects!

programme.title: Make It Count
programme.desc: When we think about the needs of others, we end up benefitting ourselves. Sounds like something from your Social Studies class? Well, it is Maths actually, Game Theory to be exact. In this episode, we look at the Maths behind why it is better to be considerate, to co-operate and to forgive; why making others lose out hurts us instead; and how understanding all this can help us predict natural disasters.

programme.title: DENVER the Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: OddBods
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: In this episode, our Try-ers are going to try pancake art for the first time! They will also attempt to break the world record for the highest pancake flip. Can they do it?

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: The Buffycats are singing a song with a special guest: Robin, the mommy robin redbreast, who is very happy because her baby is ready to hatch from its egg! But once back to her nest, Robin panics... her egg isn't there anymore!

programme.title: Power Rangers Super Beast Morphers
programme.desc: Following his first major defeat, Evox has possessed Mayor Daniels and plots to finish what he started with the help of Scrozzle and his new generals, Robo-Blaze and Robo-Roxy. However, once they learn of his return, the Beast Morpher Rangers jump back into action to stop him once-and-for all.

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

programme.title: Mega Man: Fully Charged
programme.desc: An "unscheduled" TV appearance not only lands Aki in trouble for missing class, but sets Ice Man on a misguided mission to "unite" (i.e. freeze together) every human and robot couple in the city! Aki, Suna, and Peter Punk--- Aki's tutor for the day--- pay a visit to the Musem of the Hard Age. When Blasto Woman stops by to plunder the museum's cache of military-grade weaponry, Aki goes Mega to save the artifacts and learn about them in the process.

programme.title: Kong - King Of The Apes
programme.desc: When Richard's Bionobots all fail to destroy Kong, Richard calls in the military, which try to shoot Kong off San Francisco's iconic golden bridge. He escapes thanks to Lukas, who tells Kong to go to their secret place. Jonesy, Amy, Danny and Anita all join Kong and Lukas at their super hi-tech tree fort' hideout in the Redwoods.

programme.title: Brain Juice
programme.desc: Brain Juice is a roving Quiz Game Show that goes from school to school to settle once and for all who is the smartest kid in class.

programme.desc: Four young men who belong to a New England supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Meanwhile, jealousy and suspicion threaten to tear them apart.

programme.desc: A mother-to-be is pregnant with her first daughter and her husband hires an innocent-looking girl to give her massages. But is she really just a massage therapist, or is there more to her? Be careful who, or what, you invite into your home.

programme.desc: A clue leads Danny and Lexi to a castle where the Germans may have hidden Cleopatra's sarcophagus; Fabi rescues Dr. Castillo's kidnapped assistant; Hardwick reveals information to Fabi and Gwen about others who are searching for Cleopatra.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent - The Champions
programme.desc: A British talent competition series, featuring a variety of winners, finalists, and other successful or notable participants from past seasons.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson presents and stars in "The Titan Games," a groundbreaking new athletic competition based on Dwayne's belief that within each and every one of us is the potential for greatness.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, bad-ass stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets.

Titipo envies Steam because Steam doesn't have to do work and always rest at the station where it does not operate anymore. But Steam wants to run like Titipo.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo meets an Atlantic puffin in the garden while playing with his remote-controlled car. The Junior Rangers decide to take the puffin home to Iceland. There, Leo has a mishap at the edge of a cliff. After an Asian palm civet steals Hero's food, the Junior Rangers set off to bring the civet back to where it belongs. The trip takes them to the rainforest, a durian plantation and a run-in with a wild boar!

programme.title: Super Wings : Super Pets
programme.desc: The SWs and crew land World Aircraft at World Airport for a day of cleaning their ship. When the Super Pets become too rambunctious and cause cleaning chaos, Storm's sister arrives and volunteers to take care of the SPs for the day. Unfortunately, Golden Boy shows up with a plan to take the SPs away with him. Storm, Jett and the SPs team up to thwart his plan and send Golden Boy packing.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: Does Dolos really have a lead on finding Ant's grandparents? Or is he leading the Nektons into a dangerous chasm between moving tectonic plates for nefarious purposes?

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Following one of Madcap's plans related to the powers of Minergy, Axel ends up in Madcap's body, while Madcap ends up... in Action Axel's body!

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: Iz's wrestling idol, Teddy Bear is holding an autograph signing session after school. But a surprise mock test is announced meaning Iz won't make it there in time. With encouragement from Bonemasher, Iz decides to sneak out from the test so he can get there in time.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzy's split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortuneteller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.desc: The Top 10 arrive at Mandai Zoo and learn of their first team challenge. They are to create sustainable menus for zoo workers and supporters. Held at the Night Safari's tipi tent, the dinner is to raise awareness of the environmental impact our food choices have. The diners decide which team is safe from elimination. The losing team returns to the MasterChef Kitchen for an elimination challenge with Guest Chef Lisa Tang where they must impress with just one pan in one hour.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: The sun rises on an average day in May, and the animals of the American tropics get ready to beat the heat, from Peruvian penguins, to Colombian rainforest monkeys, to the strange iguanas stationed on the Pacific outpost of the Galapagos Islands.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers
programme.desc: Embark on the ultimate river voyage down three of the world's most epic rivers - the Amazon, the Nile and the Mississippi. This series reveals the astonishing wildlife and breathtaking landscapes of these legendary waterways from their source to their mouth. The latest technology, previously unfilmed locations and drone footage reveals their true character in a way not seen before.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Anthony forgets to buy a Mother's Day present for Pei Ling and there is barely enough time to get one. Arasi and Alex have a tiff when he goes overboard trying to please Christine. Mandy surprisingly comes to Aravind's rescue when he is faced with school bullies.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Relationship blues affect Eddie as well. When he finds out Xiao Wei has been using him all this while, is he willing to give her up?

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: Singapore is a modern metropolis that may seem slightly authoritarian, but if you scrape below the surface, you can find the true grit of the locals. With so many people from so many different cultures, Singapore is truly a diverse place where you can find just about any kind of food and the opportunity for a better life, is available for all.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food In Minutes
programme.desc: With his natural charm, Donal is serving up simple, crowd-pleasing meals and snacks designed around his hectic family life which will fit easily into yours. With two young children and a busy work schedule, Donal is an expert at coming up with creative, seasonal recipes that keep the pressure off him and his wife, Sofie. He shows us fantastic recipes for spectacular Sunday roasts; time-saving tips and hacks for when you're in a rush; easily freezable bulk meals; special dinners for two.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: Melbourne
